mapper.insert: insert into listboard( boardIdx, loginId, title, price, category, contents, deleteYn, insertTime, deleteTime )values ( #{boardIdx}, #{loginId}, #{title}, #{price}, #{category}, #{contents}, IFNULL(#{deleteYn}, 'N'), #{insertTime}, #{deleteTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM listboard WHERE deleteYn = 'N'
SELECT boardIdx, loginId, title, price, contents, deleteYn, insertTime, deleteTime FROM listboard WHERE deleteYn = 'N' AND loginId = #{loginId} ORDER BY boardIdx DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM listboard WHERE deleteYn = 'N' AND loginId = #{loginId}

SELECT boardIdx, loginId, title, price, category, contents, deleteYn, insertTime, deleteTime FROM listboard WHERE deleteYn = 'N' AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') ORDER BY boardIdx DESC LIMIT #{paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}

SELECT boardIdx, loginId, title, price, category, contents, deleteYn, insertTime, deleteTime FROM listboard WHERE deleteYn = 'N' AND category = #{categoriesProduct} ORDER BY boardIdx DESC LIMIT #{paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}
SELECT boardIdx, loginId, title, price, category, contents, deleteYn, insertTime, deleteTime, views, likeCount FROM listboard WHERE deleteYn = 'N' AND boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
